sentences.en: Conclusion: The abuse of antibiotic, hormone, antifebrile is common in the outpatients, and the use of drug in the outpatients should be more properly adminstrated.
sentences.cn: 结论院外抗生素、激素、退热药的使用存在滥用现象，需要进一步规范儿童呼吸道感染的临床用药。

sentences.en: I'm sure an antifebrile injection will bring your fever down in no time.
sentences.cn: 我相信注射一针退热剂会使你的热度立刻降下来.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the antifebrile effects and changes of toxicity after compatibility of both compound isatis leaf injection and compound amidopyrine injection.
sentences.cn: 目的探索复方大青叶注射液与复方氨基比林注射液配伍后的解热效果及毒性的变化。
